content.question: The expansion of trade routes along the coast of Africa as shown on Map 2 was most directly facilitated by which of the following?

choices.label: Expanding Chinese influence as a result of maritime voyages under the Ming dynasty
Changes in fishing practices in the Indian Ocean
Improved ship designs and navigational technologies
Commercial decline in Europe as a result of the global cooling of climate known as the Little Ice Age

content.answer: Improved ship designs and navigational technologies
